question_etxt: The Transport Canada Drone Management Portal is where you manage your drone certificates.
explanation_etxt: The Transport Canada Drone Management Portal is where you manage your drone certificates.

question_etxt: A serial number is the number provided once you register.
explanation_etxt: The serial number is the product code for your drone.
Each drone you own must have its own registration number. If you have 3 drones, you need to register all 3. They will each receive their own registration number.

question_etxt: Where do you manage your drone's registration number? For example, update the address associated with the drone?
explanation_etxt: The only place to manage your drone's registration is online through the Drone Management Portal.

question_etxt: Permanent markers can fade over time.
explanation_etxt: Permanent marker can fade over time.

question_etxt: Which option is not an acceptable way to mark the registration number on your drone?
explanation_etxt: The ink of a pen will fade rapidly overtime and will be easily erase through manipulation, and weather exposure
Light coloured pen is hard to read. Small writing is hard to read.

question_etxt: The "make" of a drone refers to the product type produced by a manufacturer.
question_ftxt: The "make" of a drone refers to the product type produced by a manufacturer. (fr)
explanation_etxt: The "make" of a drone refers to the manufacturer, for example, DJI.
explanation_ftxt: The "make" of a drone refers to the manufacturer, for example, DJI.

question_etxt: Weather does not impact the drone flight behavior and/or the controller.
question_ftxt: Weather does not impact the drone flight behavior and/or the controller. (fr)
explanation_etxt: Many weather conditions can impact the drone flight behavior and its controller.
explanation_ftxt: Many weather conditions can impact the drone flight behavior and its controller.(fr)

question_etxt: Which of the following is NOT a benefit to knowing your drone?
question_ftxt: Which of the following is NOT a benefit to knowing your drone? (fr)
explanation_etxt: There are many benefits to you and Canadians when you know the details about your drone.
explanation_ftxt: There are many benefits to you and Canadians when you know the details about your drone.

question_etxt: Which of the following statements is most true?
question_ftxt: Which of the following statements is most true? (fr)
explanation_etxt: All the components of your drone and associated components could potentially be affected by the weather conditions.
